name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2019
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2019 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite professional football team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents and calling each play to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/Win7/Win8.X/Win10 Processor: Intel or AMD, 32 bit or 64 bit Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 768 display capable of running 32-bit color or higher Storage: 250 MB available space
